main event: A UFO indoctrination session for personnel representatives was held on February 18-19, 1957.
interesting points: The session included a welcome by a Scientific Advisor, The agenda covered various types of UFO reports and their evaluation criteria, The meeting addressed the public's UFO correspondence and criticism towards the Air Force, Demonstrations on analysis and validation of UFO reports were part of the agenda, The discussion included a detailed survey of old UFO cases from 1947-1953.
sighted object: No specific sighting reported; document is about UFO investigation procedures.
witness description: Maj. Byrne and Mr. Saunders, representatives at the indoctrination session.
